title: 3D Foundation
description: Introduces students to the fundamental principles of three-dimensional art and design through basic concepts, techniques, and technical practice. Focuses on three-dimensional art and the design fundamentals of sculpture, public art, architecture, and the industrial-design process and production. This course is a hybrid studio/lecture.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to art majors during first-pass enrollment; restrictions lifted after first pass.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and secondary studio section. Enrollment restricted to declared and proposed Art majors during first pass; enrollment restrictions lifted for second pass.
